general.gigTitle: design and develop modern and responsive wordpress website

sellerCard.oneLiner: Full Stack Web Developer and Wordpress Expert
sellerCard.description: I am a experienced Full Stack Web Developer/Wordpress Expert  that oversees a group of graphic designers and SEO optimizers with more than 6+ years of expertise. I've completed more than a  200+ website projects with fully satisfied customers.

description.content:
I am a experienced Full Stack Web Developer/Wordpress Expert that oversees a group of graphic designers and SEO optimizers with more than 6 years of expertise.

We specialize in Modern Professional Customized Wordpress web development 


I will give

  1. Mobile Responsive
  2. Redesign/Backup/Cloning/Migration
  3. Best of class Elementor suite
  4. Fully editable website and Easy to use Admin Panel
  5. SEO Optimized (Web On-Page SEO)
  6. Security & Web Speed Optimization
  7. W3C validated clean code
  8. Cross-Browser Compatibility
  9. Blogging & Social Media 
  10. Ecommerce, Multilingual, Multi-Currency
  11. Any type of form that will need to integrate with MailChimp or your server mail system.


Professional Responsive WordPress Website Development 


  • Landing Page
  • WordPress Blogs: Personal, Fashion, Food or Others
  • Infor Site
  • E-commerce (WooCommerce)
  • Portfolios
  • Real Estate
  • Business
  • Job Portal
  • News, Magzine
  • Author, Writers, Books
  • Gym, Athlete, Sports
  • Hotel Booking and Appointment
  • And much more...


1 Week free support after completion


Requirements: (if you havn't any idea about this let me know)

  • Domain and hosting of your website.


Client satisfaction is my first Priority


Please contact me before placing an order.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You need to provide  all text/copy content for the website upfront, as well as logo original files and the login to current site (if any) and hosting/domain provider account.

packageList.title: Startups
packageList.description: Modern Website, Fully responsive and professional Landing Page design. 5 - 6 Sections and basic SEO

packageList.title: Medium Business or E-Shop
packageList.description: BASIC package + Upto 5 -7 pages complete WordPress website with blog, basic SEO. Best for Business

packageList.title: Pro Business or E-Com
packageList.description: STANDARD package + complete WordPress website (Upto 10- 12 pages) Full functional e-commerce Website
